catalogs.name: TV Show Merchandise Catalog
catalogs.description: This catalog contains a variety of merchandise related to popular TV shows.

featuredTvShow.name: Game of Thrones
featuredTvShow.additionalDescription: A medieval fantasy epic based on the books by George R.R. Martin.

tvShows.name: The Office
tvShows.description: The Office is an American mockumentary sitcom that depicts the everyday lives of office employees in the Scranton, Pennsylvania branch of the fictional Dunder Mifflin Paper Company.

merchandise.name: The Office T-Shirt
merchandise.description: This T-shirt features the iconic logo of The Office.

tvShows.name: Friends
tvShows.description: Friends is an American television sitcom created by David Crane and Marta Kauffman that aired on NBC from September 22, 1994, to May 6, 2004.

merchandise.name: Friends Central Perk Mug
merchandise.description: This mug is a replica of the coffee mug used by the characters in Friends.

tvShows.name: Game of Thrones
tvShows.description: A medieval fantasy epic based on the books by George R.R. Martin.
